vruti.letter:
My Dearest VR,

In the quiet moments, my thoughts drift to you, a gentle melody in the symphony of my days. You are the warmth of the morning sun, the serene light of the moon, a constant source of joy and wonder. Every shared smile, every quiet understanding, weaves another thread into the beautiful tapestry of our connection. This is just a small whisper of what you mean to me, a secret held in the heart, now shared with you.

smit.letter:
To my dear Samu,

I wanted to take a moment to put into words something my heart feels every day. You have a way of making ordinary moments feel extraordinary. Your laughter is my favorite sound, and your strength inspires me more than you know. This is a small token, a secret note to remind you of the special place you hold in my life. Thank you for being you.
